tit.e: Ocho Monogatari (tales of Heian and Kamakura period)
Ocho Monogatari (tales from the Heian and Kamakura periods)
Ocho Monogatari (tales from the Heian and Kamakura periods)

sen.j: 王朝物語（おうちょうものがたり）は、平安時代後期から室町時代前期ごろにかけて作られた小説・物語群のうち、和文と平仮名表記をもっぱらとし、王朝期の風俗や美意識・文学観念に依拠しつつ製作されたものを指す。
sen.e: Among a group of novels and tales made from the late Heian period to the early Muromachi period, Ocho Monogatari refers to the ones that are characterized by Japanese sentences written in Hiragana (the Japanese syllabaries), and they were created on the basis of the customs, an aesthetic sense, and an idea of literature in the period of Court rule.

Among the novels and tales written from the late Heian period to the early Muromachi period, Ocho Monogatari refers to the ones that are characterized by having Japanese sentences written in Hiragana (the Japanese syllabaries), and having been created on the basis of the customs, aesthetic sense, and the concepts of literature during the period of Court rule.

Among the novels and tales written from the late Heian period to the early Muromachi period, Ocho Monogatari refers to the ones that are characterized by having Japanese sentences written in Hiragana (the Japanese syllabaries), and having been created on the basis of the customs, aesthetic sense, and the concepts of literature during the period of Court rule.

sen.j: 一般的には作り物語を中心とする概念であるが、歌物語や歴史物語などをも広く含みつつ、中世・近世の小説・説話類と対置することも多い。
sen.e: Generally speaking, it is a concept centering on tsukuri monogatari (fanciful tale), but at the same time it is opposed to a group of novels and tales made in the medieval and early-modern times which widely contain uta monogatari (poem-tale), historical tales, and so on.

Generally speaking, these are tsukuri monogatari (fanciful tale) in concept, but at the same time they differ from novels and tales written in the medieval and early-modern times which widely contained uta monogatari (poem-tale), historical tales, and so on.

Generally speaking, these are tsukuri monogatari (fanciful tale) in concept, but at the same time they include a wide range of tales such as uta monogatari (poem-tale), historical tales, and so on; they are often compared with novels and tales written in the medieval and early-modern times.
sen.cmt: 歌物語や歴史物語も王朝物語に含まれることもある、という意味と解釈して書き換えました。
